sen.j: 大岩山（おおいわやま）とは、京都府京都市伏見区と山科区南西部にまたがる山。
sen.e: Mt. Oiwa is a mountain extending over Fushimi Ward and the south-western part of Yamashina Ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Mt. Oiwa is a mountain extending over Fushimi Ward and the south-western part of Yamashina Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Mt. Oiwa is a mountain extending over Fushimi Ward and the south-western part of Yamashina Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 京都市伏見区の深草と醍醐のあいだに聳えている。
sen.e: Mt Oiwa is towering between Fukakusa area and Daigo area of Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City.
Mt. Oiwa is towering between Fukakusa area and Daigo area of Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: ピリオド補足しました。
sen.e: Mt. Oiwa is towering between Fukakusa area and Daigo area of Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 岩を祭神とする大岩神社がある。
sen.e: There is Oiwa-jinja Shrine which enshrines a sacred rock ("iwa" in Japanese) in the mountain.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: There is Oiwa-jinja Shrine which enshrines a sacred rock ("iwa" in Japanese) in the mountain.
There is Oiwa-jinja Shrine which enshrines a sacred rock ("iwa" in Japanese) in the mountain.

sen.j: 山頂にはゴルフ場や通信施設（西日本電信電話、テレビ電波中継施設、ラジオ送信施設）がある。
sen.e: At the mountaintop are a golf course and communication facilities (for NTT West, TV relay broadcasting, and radio transmission).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: At the mountaintop are a golf course and communication facilities (for NTT West, TV relay broadcasting, and radio transmission).
At the mountaintop are a golf course and communication facilities (for NTT West, TV relay broadcasting, and radio transmission).

sen.j: 三角点は設置されていない。
sen.e: Triangulation point is not set in the mountain.
Triangulation point is not set in the mountain.
Triangulation point is not set in the mountain.

tit.j: テレビ中継所・ラジオ送信所
tit.e: TV relay station and radio transmitting station
TV relay station and radio transmitting station

sen.j: テレビは、おもに醍醐地区向けにUHF波が中継されている。
sen.e: UHF signal for TV is relayed here for Daigo area.
UHF signal for TV is relayed here for Daigo area.
UHF signal for TV is relayed here for Daigo area.

sen.j: また、コミュニティ放送「京都リビングエフエム」の送信設備がある。
sen.e: There is also a transmitting facility of a community broadcasting "Kyoto Living FM."
There is also a transmitting facility of a community broadcasting 'Kyoto Living FM.'
There is also a transmitting facility of a community broadcasting 'Kyoto Living FM.'

sen.j: NHK教育テレビジョン、MBS毎日放送、ABC朝日放送、KTV関西テレビ放送、YTV讀賣テレビ放送については、生駒山からの電波を直接受信して視聴する。
sen.e: Local households receive TV signals directly from Mt. Ikoma when watching the programs by NHK Educational TV, MBS Mainichi Broadcasting System, Asahi Broadcasting Corporation, KTV Kansai Telecasting Corporation, and YTV Yomiuri Telecasting Corporation.
sen.cmt: Mainichi Broadcasting System, Inc.としました。
sen.e: Local households receive TV signals directly from Mt. Ikoma when watching the programs by NHK Educational TV, MBS Mainichi Broadcasting System, Asahi Broadcasting Corporation, KTV Kansai Telecasting Corporation, and YTV Yomiuri Telecasting Corporation.

Local households receive TV signals directly from Mt. Ikoma when watching the programs by NHK Educational TV, MBS Mainichi Broadcasting System, Asahi Broadcasting Corporation, KTV Kansai Telecasting Corporation, and YTV Yomiuri Telecasting Corporation.

sen.j: NHK総合についても、生駒山送出のNHK大阪放送局(JOBK)を見るという世帯も少なくない。
sen.e: As for NHK General TV, quite a few households in this area watch the programs of NHK Osaka Broadcasting Station (JOBK.)
As for NHK General TV, quite a few households in this area watch the programs of NHK Osaka Broadcasting Station (JOBK).
As for NHK General TV, quite a few households in this area watch the programs of NHK Osaka Broadcasting Station (JOBK).

sen.j: （大阪総合とNHK京都放送局の番組内容の大半は同じだが、一部独自編成がある。）
sen.e: (Almost all programs are the same between NHK Osaka and Kyoto stations while some programs are originals by each station.)
(Almost all programs are the same between NHK Osaka and NHK Kyoto stations while some programs are originals by each station.)
(Almost all programs are the same between NHK Osaka and NHK Kyoto stations while some programs are originals by each station.)

sen.j: FM845の送信施設は、他の施設とは別に建てられている。
sen.e: The transmitting facility of FM845 (Kyoto Living FM) is built separately from other facilities.
The transmitting facility of FM845 (Kyoto Living FM) is built separately from other facilities.
The transmitting facility of FM845 (Kyoto Living FM) is built separately from other facilities.
